abstract: After months of speculation, the Facebook iPad application is finally available as a free download. The app is likely to benefit Apple and Facebook.
snippet: After months of speculation, the Facebook iPad application is finally available as a free download. The app is likely to benefit Apple and Facebook.
lead_paragraph: It has been the equivalent of waiting for Bigfoot. Bloggers had seen it. Developers said they had worked on it. Facebook denied its existence. Everyone else just wanted to know if it was real.

headline.main: At Long Last, Facebook Releases an iPad App
